comment.author: 78249091@N05
comment._content:
Commonwealth War Graves Commission has following details
BAILLIE, HUGH
Rank:Private                          Service No:S/40518
Date of Death:11/04/1917       Age:20
Regiment/Service:      Cameron Highlanders  6th Bn. 
Memorial   ARRAS MEMORIAL             Panel Reference Bay 9.

Additional Information:
Son of James and Marion Baillie, of 26, Hillside Place, Springburn, Glasgow. 

A Draughtsman with the N.B. Loco. Coy., Ltd., of Springburn, Glasgow.
